amendment.description: Amendment sought to create a separate exception for plaintiffs seeking compensation resulting from the bad faith of an insurer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House Report 114-428 to create a separate exception for plaintiffs seeking compensation resulting from the bad faith of an insurer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 237 (Roll no. 87).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Cartwright.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Cartwright amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 178 - 237 (Roll no. 87).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
